name: Cheese-Lover's Pasta Roll-Ups
directions: 2. MIX first 5 ingredients until well blended.

3. SPREAD 1/2 cup pasta sauce onto bottom of 13x9-inch baking dish. Spread each noodle with 3 Tbsp. cheese mixture; roll up. Place, seam-sides down, in dish. Top with remaining sauce and Parmesan; cover.
4. BAKE 40 to 50 min. or until heated through, uncovering the last 10 min.
notes:
ONE EFFORT, TWO MEALS: Assemble roll-ups as directed; place half in each of 2 (9-inch) square baking dishes. Bake 1 as directed and keep the other for later. Cover with heavy-duty foil. Freeze up to 1 month. When ready to serve, thaw overnight in refrigerator. Bake, covered, 1 hour 5 min. or until heated through, uncovering the last 10 min. 
 HEALTHY LIVING: Have 60 calories and 7 grams of total fat, including 4 grams of saturated fat, per serving by preparing with light ricotta cheese, Kraft Part Skim Mozzarella Shredded Cheese and Kraft 100% Light Parmesan Grated Cheese.
